amendment.description: Page 5, after line 7, insert the following new section (and conform the table of contents accordingly): SEC. 4. PROHIBITION ON EARMARKS. None of the funds appropriated pursuant to this Act may be used for a Congressional earmark as defined in clause 9(d) of rule XXI of the rules of the House of Representatives.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 23 printed in House Report 111-256 to prohibit funds appropriated under the bill to be used for Congressional earmarks as defined by clause 9(d) of rule XXI of the Rules of the House of Representatives.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Flake amendment (A022) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Flake amendment (A022) Agreed to by voice vote.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A022) offered by Mr. Flake.
